lines: I MUST HAVE THE SAVIOUR WITH ME
A Ndzi Nge Fambi Ndzexe, A Ndzi N’wi Twe Kusuhani, A Ndzi Anga Mavokwen.
A Ndzi Nge Chavi Nchumu, Ndzi Ya La A Rhandzaka; Ndzi Ta Ya Ndzi Nga Vileri, Loko Ndzi N’wi Landzela.
2. Tana Yesu Muponisi, Hikuva Ndzi Tsanile,
U Chavelela Hi Rito, Leri Pfuxelelaka.
3. Tana Yesu Muponisi, Rendzweni Ra Vutomi,
Miringweni, Ku Tsakeni, Na Kona Tinyimpini.
4. Tana Yesu Muponisi, U Ta Ndzi Komba Ndlela,
Ku Fikela Eyordani, Loko Ndzi Pela Nambu.
